steps.title: Confirm
steps.description: Indicate the order is ready and wait for the carriers to come pick it up

steps.title: Handover
steps.description: Schedule pickup or drop-off. First scan starts tracking and triggers vendor milestones.

steps.title: Track
steps.description: Buyer + vendor receive updates. Exceptions (customs, address) surface in the order thread.

steps.title: Deliver
steps.description: Signature by default. Fit window begins; alterations/returns flow if needed.
